Author: Critical_Impact
Name: Inventory Tools
Description: Adds in a window that allows for the searching and filtering of specific items across inventories. Adds visualisation in game to see where your items should go.
Changelog:
Updated XivCommon dependency to latest version
Fixed issue with tooltips causing lag when control or corresponding gamepad button pressed
Don't highlight empty slots when using inverted highlighting
Allow for tab and item highlighting to be inverted separately
Track equipped items and armory chest items(no highlighting yet, wanted to get bug fixes out this is a bonus)
